reviews.review: This game is pretty fun if you hate yourself, but from what I've found, most steam users hate themselves, so you may like this.

Goat game, best professional viewing experience out of any game as well. Do not recommend matchmaking as the servers are still 64 tick with a very toxic community. Play on premium servers. Skins, maps, and weapons keep the game fresh. 9.5/10 unmatched gameplay and overall experience.
